00037   // Globals...
00038   const int XTC::magicints[] = {
00039     0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 25, 32, 40, 50, 64,
00040     80, 101, 128, 161, 203, 256, 322, 406, 512, 645, 812, 1024, 1290, // 31
00041     1625, 2048, 2580, 3250, 4096, 5060, 6501, 8192, 10321, 13003, // 41
00042     16384, 20642, 26007, 32768, 41285, 52015, 65536,82570, 104031, // 50
00043     131072, 165140, 208063, 262144, 330280, 416127, 524287, 660561, // 58
00044     832255, 1048576, 1321122, 1664510, 2097152, 2642245, 3329021, // 65
00045     4194304, 5284491, 6658042, 8388607, 10568983, 13316085, 16777216 // 72
00046   };

00048   const int XTC::firstidx = 9;
00049 
00050   const int XTC::lastidx = 73;
00051 
00052   const int XTC::magic = 1995;

00055   // The following are largely from the xdrlib...
00056   int XTC::sizeofint(int size) {
00057     int n = 0;
00058     while ( size > 0 ) {
00059       size >>= 1;
00060       ++n;
00061     }
00062     return(n);
00063   }
00064 
00065   
00066   int XTC::sizeofints(uint* data, const uint n) {
00067     uint nbytes = 1;
00068     uint bytes[32];
00069     uint nbits = 0;
00070     
00071     bytes[0] = 1;
00072     for (uint i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00073       uint tmp = 0;
00074       uint bytecnt;
00075       for (bytecnt = 0; bytecnt < nbytes; ++bytecnt) {
00076         tmp += bytes[bytecnt] * data[i];
00077         bytes[bytecnt] = tmp & 0xff;
00078         tmp >>= 8;
00079       }
00080       while (tmp != 0) {
00081         bytes[bytecnt++] = tmp & 0xff;
00082         tmp >>= 8;
00083       }
00084       nbytes = bytecnt;
00085     }
00086 
00087     uint num = 1;
00088     --nbytes;
00089     while (bytes[nbytes] >= num) {
00090       ++nbits;
00091       num *= 2;
00092     }
00093 
00094     return(nbits + nbytes*8);
00095   }
00096 
00097   
00098   int XTC::decodebits(int* buf, uint nbits) {
00099 
00100     int mask = (1 << nbits) -1;
00101 
00102     unsigned char *cbuf = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(buf) + 3*sizeof(*buf);
00103     int cnt = buf[0];
00104     uint lastbits = static_cast<uint>(buf[1]);
00105     uint lastbyte = static_cast<uint>(buf[2]);
00106     
00107     int num = 0;
00108     while (nbits >= 8) {
00109       lastbyte = ( lastbyte << 8 ) | cbuf[cnt++];
00110       num |=  (lastbyte >> lastbits) << (nbits - 8);
00111       nbits -=8;
00112     }
00113     if (nbits > 0) {
00114       if (lastbits < nbits) {
00115         lastbits += 8;
00116         lastbyte = (lastbyte << 8) | cbuf[cnt++];
00117       }
00118       lastbits -= nbits;
00119       num |= (lastbyte >> lastbits) & ((1 << nbits) -1);
00120     }
00121     num &= mask;
00122     buf[0] = cnt;
00123     buf[1] = static_cast<int>(lastbits);
00124     buf[2] = static_cast<int>(lastbyte);
00125 
00126     return(num);
00127   }
00128 
00129 
00130   void XTC::decodeints(int* buf, const int nints, int nbits,
00131                        uint* sizes, int* nums) {
00132     int bytes[32];
00133     int i, j, num_of_bytes, p, num;
00134   
00135     bytes[1] = bytes[2] = bytes[3] = 0;
00136     num_of_bytes = 0;
00137     while (nbits > 8) {
00138       bytes[num_of_bytes++] = decodebits(buf, 8);
00139       nbits -= 8;
00140     }
00141     if (nbits > 0) {
00142       bytes[num_of_bytes++] = decodebits(buf, nbits);
00143     }
00144     for (i = nints-1; i > 0; i--) {
00145       num = 0;
00146       for (j = num_of_bytes-1; j >=0; j--) {
00147         num = (num << 8) | bytes[j];
00148         p = num / sizes[i];
00149         bytes[j] = p;
00150         num = num - p * sizes[i];
00151       }
00152       nums[i] = num;
00153     }
00154     nums[0] = bytes[0] | (bytes[1] << 8) | (bytes[2] << 16) | (bytes[3] << 24);
00155   }

00159   // Coordinates are converted into GCoords and stored in the object's
00160   // coords_ vector
00161 
00162   bool XTC::readCompressedCoords(void)
00163   {
00164     int minint[3], maxint[3], *lip;
00165     int smallidx, minidx, maxidx;
00166     uint sizeint[3], sizesmall[3], bitsizeint[3] = {0,0,0}, size3;
00167     int k, *buf1, *buf2, lsize, flag;
00168     int smallnum, smaller, larger, i, is_smaller, run;
00169     xtc_t precision, inv_precision;
00170     int tmp, *thiscoord,  prevcoord[3];
00171     unsigned int bitsize;
00172   
00173      
00174     if (!xdr_file.read(lsize))
00175       return(false);
00176 
00177     size3 = lsize * 3;
00178 
00179     /* Dont bother with compression for three atoms or less */
00180     if(lsize<=9) {
00181       float* tmp = new xtc_t[size3];
00182       xdr_file.read(tmp, size3);
00183       for (uint i=0; i<size3; i += 3)
00184         coords_.push_back(GCoord(tmp[i], tmp[i+1], tmp[i+2]) * 10.0);
00185       delete[] tmp;
00186       return(true);
00187     }
00188 
00189     /* Compression-time if we got here. Read precision first */
00190     xdr_file.read(precision);
00191     precision_ = precision;
00192   
00193     int size3padded = static_cast<int>(size3 * 1.2);
00194     buf1 = new int[size3padded];
00195     buf2 = new int[size3padded];
00196     /* buf2[0-2] are special and do not contain actual data */
00197     buf2[0] = buf2[1] = buf2[2] = 0;
00198     xdr_file.read(minint, 3);
00199     xdr_file.read(maxint, 3);
00200   
00201     sizeint[0] = maxint[0] - minint[0]+1;
00202     sizeint[1] = maxint[1] - minint[1]+1;
00203     sizeint[2] = maxint[2] - minint[2]+1;
00204         
00205     /* check if one of the sizes is to big to be multiplied */
00206     if ((sizeint[0] | sizeint[1] | sizeint[2] ) > 0xffffff) {
00207       bitsizeint[0] = sizeofint(sizeint[0]);
00208       bitsizeint[1] = sizeofint(sizeint[1]);
00209       bitsizeint[2] = sizeofint(sizeint[2]);
00210       bitsize = 0; /* flag the use of large sizes */
00211     } else {
00212       bitsize = sizeofints(sizeint, 3);
00213     }
00214         
00215     if (!xdr_file.read(smallidx)) {
00216       delete[] buf1;
00217       delete[] buf2;
00218       return(false);
00219     }
00220 
00221     tmp=smallidx+8;
00222     maxidx = (lastidx<tmp) ? lastidx : tmp;
00223     minidx = maxidx - 8; /* often this equal smallidx */
00224     tmp = smallidx-1;
00225     tmp = (firstidx>tmp) ? firstidx : tmp;
00226     smaller = magicints[tmp] / 2;
00227     smallnum = magicints[smallidx] / 2;
00228     sizesmall[0] = sizesmall[1] = sizesmall[2] = magicints[smallidx] ;
00229     larger = magicints[maxidx];
00230 
00231     /* buf2[0] holds the length in bytes */
00232   
00233     if (!xdr_file.read(buf2, 1)) {
00234       delete[] buf1;
00235       delete[] buf2;
00236       return(false);
00237     }
00238 
00239     if (!xdr_file.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&(buf2[3])), static_cast<uint>(buf2[0]))) {
00240       delete[] buf1;
00241       delete[] buf2;
00242       return(false);
00243     }
00244     buf2[0] = buf2[1] = buf2[2] = 0;
00245   
00246     inv_precision = 1.0 / precision;
00247     run = 0;
00248     i = 0;
00249     lip = buf1;
00250     while ( i < lsize ) {
00251       thiscoord = (int *)(lip) + i * 3;
00252     
00253       if (bitsize == 0) {
00254         thiscoord[0] = decodebits(buf2, bitsizeint[0]);
00255         thiscoord[1] = decodebits(buf2, bitsizeint[1]);
00256         thiscoord[2] = decodebits(buf2, bitsizeint[2]);
00257       } else {
00258         decodeints(buf2, 3, bitsize, sizeint, thiscoord);
00259       }
00260     
00261       i++;
00262       thiscoord[0] += minint[0];
00263       thiscoord[1] += minint[1];
00264       thiscoord[2] += minint[2];
00265     
00266       prevcoord[0] = thiscoord[0];
00267       prevcoord[1] = thiscoord[1];
00268       prevcoord[2] = thiscoord[2];
00269     
00270       flag = decodebits(buf2, 1);
00271       is_smaller = 0;
00272       if (flag == 1) {
00273         run = decodebits(buf2, 5);
00274         is_smaller = run % 3;
00275         run -= is_smaller;
00276         is_smaller--;
00277       }
00278       if (run > 0) {
00279         thiscoord += 3;
00280         for (k = 0; k < run; k+=3) {
00281           decodeints(buf2, 3, smallidx, sizesmall, thiscoord);
00282           i++;
00283           thiscoord[0] += prevcoord[0] - smallnum;
00284           thiscoord[1] += prevcoord[1] - smallnum;
00285           thiscoord[2] += prevcoord[2] - smallnum;
00286           if (k == 0) {
00287             /* interchange first with second atom for better
00288              * compression of water molecules
00289              */
00290             tmp = thiscoord[0]; thiscoord[0] = prevcoord[0];
00291             prevcoord[0] = tmp;
00292             tmp = thiscoord[1]; thiscoord[1] = prevcoord[1];
00293             prevcoord[1] = tmp;
00294             tmp = thiscoord[2]; thiscoord[2] = prevcoord[2];
00295             prevcoord[2] = tmp;
00296 
00297             coords_.push_back(GCoord(prevcoord[0] * inv_precision,
00298                                 prevcoord[1] * inv_precision,
00299                                 prevcoord[2] * inv_precision) * 10.0);
00300           } else {
00301             prevcoord[0] = thiscoord[0];
00302             prevcoord[1] = thiscoord[1];
00303             prevcoord[2] = thiscoord[2];
00304           }
00305           coords_.push_back(GCoord(thiscoord[0] * inv_precision,
00306                               thiscoord[1] * inv_precision,
00307                               thiscoord[2] * inv_precision) * 10.0);
00308         }
00309       } else {
00310         coords_.push_back(GCoord(thiscoord[0] * inv_precision,
00311                             thiscoord[1] * inv_precision,
00312                             thiscoord[2] * inv_precision) * 10.0);
00313       }
00314       smallidx += is_smaller;
00315       if (is_smaller < 0) {
00316         smallnum = smaller;
00317         if (smallidx > firstidx) {
00318           smaller = magicints[smallidx - 1] /2;
00319         } else {
00320           smaller = 0;
00321         }
00322       } else if (is_smaller > 0) {
00323         smaller = smallnum;
00324         smallnum = magicints[smallidx] / 2;
00325       }
00326       sizesmall[0] = sizesmall[1] = sizesmall[2] = magicints[smallidx] ;
00327     }
00328 
00329     delete[] buf1;
00330     delete[] buf2;
00331     return(true);
00332   }
00333 
00334 
00335   void XTC::updateGroupCoords(AtomicGroup& g) {
00336 
00337     int natoms = g.size();
00338 
00339     for (AtomicGroup::iterator i = g.begin(); i != g.end(); ++i) {
00340       int idx = (*i)->id()-1;
00341       if (idx < 0 || idx > natoms)
00342         throw(std::runtime_error("atom index into trajectory frame is out of range"));
00343       (*i)->coords(coords_[idx]);
00344     }
00345     
00346     // XTC files *always* have a periodic box...
00347     g.periodicBox(box);
00348   }
00349 
00350 
00351   bool XTC::parseFrame(void) {
00352     if (ifs()->eof())
00353       return(false);
00354 
00355     // First, clear out existing coords...  A read error after this
00356     // point will invalidate the current object's coord state
00357 
00358     coords_.clear();
00359     Header h;
00360     if (!readFrameHeader(h))
00361       return(false);
00362     
00363     box = GCoord(h.box[0], h.box[4], h.box[8]) * 10.0; // Convert to Angstroms
00364     return(readCompressedCoords());
00365   }
00366 
00367 
00368   bool XTC::readFrameHeader(XTC::Header& hdr) {
00369     int magic_no;
00370     int ok = xdr_file.read(magic_no);
00371     if (!ok)
00372       return(false);
00373     if (magic_no != magic)
00374       throw(std::runtime_error("Invalid XTC magic number"));
00375 
00376     // Defer error-checks until the end...
00377     xdr_file.read(hdr.natoms);
00378 
00379     xdr_file.read(hdr.step);
00380     xdr_file.read(hdr.time);
00381     ok = xdr_file.read(hdr.box, 9);
00382     if (!ok)
00383       throw(std::runtime_error("Error while reading XTC frame header"));
00384 
00385     return(true);
00386   }
00387 
00388 
00389   // Scan the trajectory file, skipping each compressed frame.  In the
00390   // process, we build up an index relating file-pos to frame index.
00391   // This permits fast seeking of indivual frames.
00392   void XTC::scanFrames(void) {
00393     frame_indices.clear();
00394     
00395     rewindImpl();
00396 
00397     Header h;
00398 
00399     while (! ifs()->eof()) {
00400       size_t pos = ifs()->tellg();
00401       bool ok = readFrameHeader(h);
00402       if (!ok) {
00403         rewindImpl();
00404         return;
00405       }
00406 
00407       frame_indices.push_back(pos);
00408       if (natoms_ == 0)
00409         natoms_ = h.natoms;
00410       else if (natoms_ != h.natoms)
00411         throw(std::runtime_error("XTC frames have differing numbers of atoms"));
00412 
00413       uint block_size = sizeof(internal::XDR::block_type);
00414       size_t offset = 9 * block_size;
00415       ifs()->seekg(offset, std::ios_base::cur);
00416       uint nbytes;
00417       xdr_file.read(nbytes);
00418       uint nblocks = nbytes / block_size;
00419       if (nbytes % block_size != 0)
00420         ++nblocks;   // round up
00421       offset = nblocks * block_size;
00422       ifs()->seekg(offset, std::ios_base::cur);
00423     }
00424   }
00425 
00426 
00427   void XTC::seekFrameImpl(const uint i) {
00428     if (i >= frame_indices.size())
00429       throw(std::runtime_error("Trying to seek past the end of the file"));
00430     
00431     ifs()->clear();
00432     ifs()->seekg(frame_indices[i], std::ios_base::beg);
00433   }
